website_summaries.verdict: These popular wipes boast a silky soft texture and extra thickness that make going green feel like an indulgence.
pros: Medical-grade material is thick and beautifully soft
Clean ingredients are safe for sensitive skin
Large size and sturdy construction effortlessly tackles any mess
Nice and moist without being too wet
Wipes come out one at a time
cons: May take longer than others to fully break down

website_summaries.verdict: Gentle, hypoallergenic baby wipes that are safe for your child's skin.
pros: Durable, extra thick wipes hold up well on even the messiest jobs – you can even clean your counters with them
Made with plant-based materials and are more than 99% water
cons: Some complain that the wipes stick together in the package

customer_reviews.title: Do Bot Buy The New Formula
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad right now!!!! They switched the honest brand baby wipes to a “new and improved” formula. Which is actually worse and not improved!!!! It has more chemicals and it breaks my baby’s skin out!!!! What a dumb idea to switch to a new formula! This new formula is horrible!!! Honest company please go back to your old formula for baby wipes!!!!! I am very angry that you sent me these new wipes without explaining it on the website. I got bait and switched!! Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to be frustrated
customer_reviews.text: For the love of all that is good, Honest please fix your wipe dispensing situation. I like the thickness and wetness of Honest over Water Wipes but I’m about to give up on Honest. They pull out of the package stuck together like a magicians never ending handkerchief. I’d like to challenge someone in Honest product design to change my squirming, rolling, 7 month old’s super poopy diaper with these clown show wipes as you pull 10 of them out of the package in one long, stuck together, chain of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Only wipes we buy
customer_reviews.text: Wont buy any other wipes. You can feel the difference in lack of product on wipes. Almost feels just like water wipes. But does the job they need to do perfectly. Baby girl wears cloth diapers. And after switching to these wipes. Weve had no issues with rashes, breakouts, or even redness. And i feel 100% comfortable using these to wipe off her hands that shes sucking on all the time. The baby wipes before I wouldnt do that with. Also these dont have the traditional baby wipe smell. Which my husband loves.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: No more red cakes/rashes! Yaaas! :D
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wipes ever! Biodegradable, durable, gentle, gets the job done! And best of all my little one's cakes looks fresh and soft again! Worth every penny! (Tried combinations of different diapers and wipes to see what the issue was... Baby's bum was red even when I kept up with diaper changes when they needed... Realized, after using one on myself, baby bloom wipes stung down south! Stopped those wipes.... They have phenoxyethanol- really bad for baby/anyone.) These are the only wipes I trust. So happy they're good for mother nature and baby 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes ever
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but I love these wipes so much I had to! I was using huggies natural care baby wipes on my little guy and he always had a rash at the end of the day. I figured the rash was because he poops a lot or something in my diet. But I decided to try these wipes and see if they made a difference and ever since I switched he hasn’t had a single diaper rash! They are definitely worth the extra money for me to keep my little one rash free.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Wipes We've Used!
customer_reviews.text: We tried several other wipes including all natural and ones with just water and the Honest wipes are by far our favorite. The wipes themselves are thick and durable, so you don't have to use as many and best of all come out of the package one at a time! They didn't come out in long endless groups like other brands. Best of all our children have never had any rashes or breakouts as a result of using these wipes! Definitely our go-to wipe!
customer_reviews.author: A. McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Different product received
customer_reviews.text: This review Is based on the description and the product received being different. I usually order the wipes thru prime, and receive the same product as described. However, this most recent time I ordered and was sent a version with english and french and the ingredients list was very different. I uave already requested return label and sent them back. I have provided photos to what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scented and gross now, falsely advertised as fragrance free....
customer_reviews.text: They changed the non scented by adding something to keep them moist longer...they were five star wipes but are now scented and 1 star.. if it says lingettes on the package do not buy them. I will add that some of the boxes still say unscented. How can these be an Amazon’s Choice.... false advertising. Amazon....Please get your act together and keep track of the products that change...
customer_reviews.author: Elias Weingarten

customer_reviews.title: NEW WIPES THAT ARE SCENTED! NO THANKS
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wasn’t crazy! After reading 3 other reviews of the wipes changing I realized that I wasn’t crazy. The second I got my monthly delivery I noticed that’s the packaging was different and then after opening the wipes they had that awful wipe smell that I can’t stand. It’s too bad because the old wipes were the only wipes I could ever find that were durable and had absolutely no scent. What the heck honest company? Why!? Please bring back the old wipes. In the mean time I’ve cancelled my subscription. I’d rather hose the poop off my kids butts than use the new wipes.
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, chemical laden, soggy DISHONESTY
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! These are not what they used to be!! I was going to give them a try, after checking the ingredient list, noticing that the packing had changed once they arrived, but then my trash started to reek. 🤢 I used to love using these. No more! The ingredients have changed to unpronounceable chemicals, they’re really wet, and after just a few days of sitting in my trash they stink! I’m done. I’m returning these and I’m not happy Amazon. There was no warning that the ingredients had changed on your site. Just did a little research and saw that their CEO has changed to a former Clorox ex. Do yourself a favor and do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: ADree

customer_reviews.title: can't believe they changed the formulation!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these baby wipes for several years for my babies and everything and felt they were totally worth the extra cost. I was shocked to find that the wipes are different than in the past and after reading the reviews realized that the formulation changed. I can no longer pull out one wipe at a time-I’m often getting 3-5 wipes out at a time and then I have to use both hands to pull them apart during diaper changes. Additionally, the wipes seem really watery and feel different. I have the used for cleaning my kids faces and noticed a recent breakout. I am now in search of a new quality brand of baby wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes, short of making your own.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes I will buy. My baby has ultra sensitive skin, eczema and many allergies. These are gentle / toxin free and do not aggravate any of his issues. They have little to no smell. The cloth used is soft and durable. It does not leave cloth pieces / residue behind or tear as you wipe. The wipes are moist, but not so much that liquid pools on your babies skin. Their motto, “...cheek to cheek” really is accurate. These are used for diaper changes, hands, faces, I even keep a pack in each bathroom for adult use. We have also flushed them without any problems. Per Honest company, wipes will biodegrade & compost in municipal/industrial facilities.
customer_reviews.author: Alina D.

customer_reviews.title: I guess Jessica Alba grew a third arm
customer_reviews.text: They “improved” this product (which I am subscribed to) so I received the new and improved instead of the original. The new ones suck. They have new chemicals and don’t come out of the package one by one I get at least four at a time. I can’t hold my baby’s poop covered bottom in the air with one hand and grab what I need with the other. This item is trash, we are taking our subscription elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Appreciate the bulk order. with a new born, there is zero time to go pick these up! I want a reliable wipe my hand won't go through, they are textured to get into every crevice, they are thick so additional unexpected liquid can't go through, haha. After trying every wipe on the market, these are my go to. Thank you honest. Also, when you pull one out, they don't alllllllll come out like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love Honest wipes. I’ve tried so many wipes and these are the only ones that I’ve found that are thick, quilted and sensitive. They also don’t feel soaked like some other packaged wipes do. They have a higher price tag then others, but the price is better on Amazon! My daughter is also pretty sensitive and these have never given her any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ONLY WIPES FOR MY ECZEMA BABY
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting soooo long for these wipes to get on subscribe and save so I didn’t have to keep going to target for them. I have 2 in diapers and use one of these boxes each month for them both. The wipes are thick and soft like cloth and my super sensitive eczema baby can not use any other wipes. Best wipes around! And with that subscribe and save discount, it’s a win win for me.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa wang

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Gentle. Good size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes. They are durable and easy to use. They get everything in fewer wipes than other brands. Very gentle and non irritating on baby's skin. What we like the most is that they are a great size and easy to tear. My husband and I try to conserve by tearing one in half for pee cleanup. The honeycomb texture is great for traction to get sticky poo unstuck.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Parents: not waste ur time! Dry, not soft, clown wipes
customer_reviews.text: Uh, do NOT buy! For all the moms out there: these wipes are not soft so irritate my babies’ skin (I have 2 so I do a fair share of diapering!), not wet enough to wipe off poop & old diaper cream without irritation, & they come out like clown wipes! I have to use double the amount so the cheaper price doesn’t even make up for that. I was trying to find a replacement for waterwipes (hate the packaging) & pampers pure (more expensive) but NOPE. Going back to those. Took these off my subscribe & save!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: New Wipes No Good
customer_reviews.text: We have used honest wipes for about a year and never had any issues. We recently bought new wipes not realizing they had changed the formula. Both of my daughters had superficial skin rashes yesterday which resolved after a little while. The rashes returned today and it just so happened I noticed the different packaging on the wipes. I read that there was a new formula and realized the rash came soon after using the wipes. Problem solved, the new wipes are no good. We will now have to find a new brand of wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: New Formula
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that I was ordering the original honest wipes but these are their new formulated ones with a changed/added preservative and they are a major decrease in quality compared to the old wipes. I am so disappointed that they changed their wipes, not only in the changed ingredients (my son actually has a sensitivity to benzoic acid so for that reason alone we cannot use them) but also in the changed quality. The quality is considerably less. I will not be ordering honest wipes anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: trustworthy
customer_reviews.text: I tried another "transparent" sensitive, "no harmful chemicals" wipe and it gave my kiddo eczema because of a common preservative they use that's known to cause eczema #eyeroll... so so grateful to go back to Honest and have my babes skin totally clear. I'm now bundling straight from honest with diapers too.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Best Go To Wipes Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Baby Wipes Ever!! My go to wipes. Took everyone of the other brand wipes gifted to me during the baby shower to stock up on these!! No chemical smell or taste and absolutely no film some other wipes leave. I use wipes to wipe my baby's mouth when she spits up; because of that I will personally test the wipes I plan to use for my daughter and wipe my mouth and even lick them to see if it leaves a taste...These leave nothing! Will not use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Shanita Washington-Ray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes I use!!! They’re thick and have enough wetness to them. Other wipes I’ve used don’t cur it. I always have these on hand. I don’t think these are scented in my opinion. I’m not sure what the package says.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: No residue. Strong material. Cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: Scent free. Strong material. Doesn't leave any residue. Great for using all over body. Doesn't have a taste of you accidently get some in your mouth. I really appreciate this because it doesn't bother the kiddo if he sticks his fingers in his mouth after using the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Canova

customer_reviews.title: Textured is a plus!
customer_reviews.text: Baby with extra sensitive skin tolerates these pretty well. I like how thick they are with texture so they have more grip as I wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: My little one uses cloth diapers but for on the go and at daycare it’s best to use traditional disposable wipes,... once my little girl started daycare she developed a consistent rash which I attribute to the wipes,.. once I switched to this brand it was bye bye rash and smooth sailing! Often people blame infrequent changes for diaper rashes or even the diaper but baby wipes have so many chemicals so that it can cause more damage than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: strong smell of soap, NOT gentle anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these wipes for a year and have loved them. my daughter has never had a single diaper rash. We recently received our normal order and the packaging was slightly different than it has been for the last year, and they smelled SO strong... kind of soapy. We continued to use them thinking maybe they just had more of the wipe solution on them by mistake, but my daughter has horrible diaper rash now. I’m not sure if Honest Company has changed their product or this was a total fluke but I won’t be buying these anymore. It’s such a bummer as we ordered a large box and won’t be using any
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and thick wipes.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I am using Honest Co. wipes but I have been using the diapers for awhile. They are soft and thick and haven’t upset my sons skin at all (he does not have very sensitive skin though). One individual package lasted me 4 days (for reference- I change my sons diapers about 8-10 times a day).
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are not biodegradable!!
customer_reviews.text: I had assumed The Honest Company would use healthier materials in their wipes. Nope. These are made from rayon, which is derived from trees, but is so processed that it is unrecognizable as such. These are not biodegradable and frankly, I'm pissed about the false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Charmayne Kilcup

customer_reviews.title: New formula is awful
customer_reviews.text: Honest Co changed the formula, we used to absolutely love these wipes, but the new formula is awful. You can squeeze them and see the soapy residue coming out of these and my little one has had a rash since we started using the new ones. Wouldn’t recommend unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong wipes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these wipes because they were 99% water based and because of the ingredients and they shipped me the previous wipes that contain silver citrate. Some have said the preferred the older version, not this new and improved version but the older version gave my baby a bad rash and irritation. I was able to buy a package of the 99% water based honest wipes, the new and improved version and his rash cleared right up. I do like the new and improved version because they are softer and more moist so it makes cleaning easier. I just wanted to write a review to be careful when you order as you may not receive the wipes displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Estein

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well for me, compare to other wipes these wipes are stronger and doing a better job comparing to other brands
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get past the price tag because they are great wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I hate that they cost SOOOO much more than other brands but we do love honest wipes and diapers for our son. I have overly sensitive skin and sadly my son was cursed with it as well! They seem to be more durable then most other brands we’ve tried and a lot kinder to his skin. Again, I wish they were so expensive, thats my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Dunnigan

customer_reviews.title: newer versions are not the same... dont buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these wipes not knowing they changed the formulation. i used the older version without any problems but these newer versions are horrible!!! i used it on my baby’s face and her whole face turned red and her skin got inflamed. it was a terrifying experience seeing her face turning red. im returning these. DONT BUY THESE WIPES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Honest diaper and wipes are the best we have used
customer_reviews.text: We buy these for my grand daughter and have since her birth. These diapers and wipes are simply amazing! My grand baby has sensitive skin and a couple times my daughter used several other "sensitive skin wipes" she received as shower gifts and the baby got a red bottom so we do not stray from Honest Co diapers and wipes. I also love the cute prints on the diapers. These diapers are very absorbent and they do not contain that funky gel that other diapers do when wet. I will mention, the panda print diapers seem to run smaller than all other prints....
customer_reviews.author: teri

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes, ever!
customer_reviews.text: We love Honest Company wipes! They are great for my child's sensitive skin, dont have an unpleasant smell, and easily clean up even the most sticky poops. We have been using them for over a year and will not use another brand of wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT...DO NOT FLUSH!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that didn't have all that soap in it for my tender areas... as an adult I just like to be clean... clean... these are great!!! DO NOT FLUSH!!!!!! Down down the toilet you morons!!! you're creating big clogs in the sewer system... do not Flush...I think it says it right on the package...for G-DS SAKE... DO NOT FLUSH!!!!!🤨
customer_reviews.author: Ghleehanna

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: The only brand my daughters booty can handle. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Carvalhal

customer_reviews.title: Way lower quality than before!!
customer_reviews.text: What happened to these wipes?????? They used to be my favorite and my new shipment is terrible. They are thinner, watery, and come out 5-6 at a time. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Okhovat

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are safest for my baby for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes ever! Don't smell or taste like anything. Quilted texture cleans baby very well. Multiple come out of warmer at a time but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! New formula is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This new formula is terrible. The wipes smell like formaldehyde. They’re too wet and do not come out of the package individually. I won’t even wipe my baby’s nose with these because I don’t want any of the new chemicals getting near his mouth. I will be switching brands, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - but not for use in dispensers
customer_reviews.text: These are good wipes - the only caveat to that is if you are using them in a warmer or dispenser. We are, and they are overlapped too much in production so much that it is impossible to dispense a wipe without pulling out the next one too far. I am constantly having to shove them back in. And, they frequently, ironically, have spots where they are not connected to the next wipe. It's feast or famine. Frustrating. I will not be buying them again based completely on that. You need 2 hands to use them successfully instead of being able to reach over and get one while wiping your baby, or adult.
customer_reviews.author: Praise God

customer_reviews.title: Honestly One Wipe & Done
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes I've tried yet. Comparing this to Pampers, huggies, and wet ones.... honest wipes are hands down way better. Yes they cost more but are worth the money. So much more efficient and soft. I literally can wipe my whole babies bottom with just one wipe after a poop. I wish they cost less but this is one thing I will forever splurge on to wipe babys bottom. I still use other wipes to wipe hands on the go lol
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Decent Baby Wipes
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd never break away from the brand I normally buy, but the lack of availability of my usual brand led to me trying "The Honest Company" brand of wipes. Under the circumstances I've had a very positive experience with this product. I will definitely buy these in the future, along side my usual brand. It's good to have options.
customer_reviews.author: Noob123

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my girls' sensitive skin plat well with these wipes! My wallet loves buying in bulk too!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: They used to be so wonderful. No babies here but we used them daily on ourselves. My husband even complained about the smell and difference and asked me to try another brand. Many more better and cheaper. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Huge bummer.
customer_reviews.text: A sneaky change in the quality of ingredients. How disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are great wipes they are very good quality and thick and soft and don’t leave behind any lint .
customer_reviews.author: FAIZ

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose wipe
customer_reviews.text: Great on my newborn and my toddler! Gentle and no scent with great grip for messes. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. They are stronger, thicker and have more grip. They really clean up in a few wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New and improve formula smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with the new and improve formula. It has a horrible smell and the wipes itself feel cheap not sturdy like the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A.

customer_reviews.title: Zero waste
customer_reviews.text: I usually get wet wipes but recently have been loving honest more because of how little I use when it comes to cleaning the bays number 2s. With the wet wipes I would have to use at least 3. With honest, I use at the most 2. I have an 8MO so his can be pretty solid. I never used it for when the baby exclusively nursed
customer_reviews.author: Serghei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY wipes I can use on my LO. She’s so sensitive. Even other brands that are “sensitive” brands give her a horrible rash. These are amazing and have never given her any rash!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hefren

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I use for all purpose on my 3 years old. Strong yet soft.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good wipes, nice size, could be wetter...
customer_reviews.text: Honest Company wipes are some of my favorites. What I like: generous size, textured, pleasant neutral smell, better ingredients, plastic snap shut lid. What I don't care for: they don't "glide" across baby like some others do and they could be a bit "wetter." Overall, I keep buying these and am pleased with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: TX.Momma.

customer_reviews.title: Good wipes
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the bad reviews I decided to buy these anyway, and I’m glad I did. Slightly bigger than Huggies wipes, and about the same thickness, but a lot stronger. They smell like they’re supposed to, which is basically no smell because their fragrance free. Our daughter didn’t break out from these, and I have no problem wiping her face and hands with them. Pricey, but worth it for the peace of mind. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TYGFSJV

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes ever!!
customer_reviews.text: We used to use Pampers and huggies wipes but Pampers wipes kept tearing with every use and Huggies wipes just felt too thin and rough. I was so happy to find that Amazon started selling these wipes in bulk! These wipes are the perfect thickness and softness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried several different natural products. This is the only one that does not make our son break out. Also feels more like cloth vs the other ones we used felt “slimey”. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and a more natural product. Have already reordered once.
customer_reviews.author: tara j hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received my second box through Amazon of the Honest wipes and I am so disappointed in the quality. Not only is it annoying pulling like four at a time out. When I go to wipe it starts falling apart. Leaving cotton ball like fuzz on my son's behind. He doesn't seem to enjoy when I wipe either, seems very uncomfortable and harsh. I definitely want my money back so I can buy a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good wipes, poor packaging design
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Pampers wipes previously but didn’t like how it left a sticky feeling on my hands afterwards. These Honest wipes are much better, no sticky feeling or scent afterwards. The wipes themselves don’t feel particularly soft, but are thick and get the job done. The packaging design is terrible. I can’t get them to come out one at a time and they pull out 2-3 stuck together. Also the lid is pretty hard to open with one hand while the other hand is preoccupied holding a squirming baby on a changing table. Just for the design, probably not going to buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: C Chan

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes! We got some pampers wipes from the hospital and had to use 4-5 wipes compared to 1 honest wipe. I definitely order it through subscribe and save. It’s worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good wipe without being to harsh
customer_reviews.text: Love the wipe. It didn't feel as harsh as the pampers wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Best wipe so far!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST natural wipes we have used and are a great price! I love that they are textured to clean well and the snapping lid so they don't dry out. I will buy these again, they lasted a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great quality: We liked for hands, not with diaper changes
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are thick and tougher than the Huggies & Pampers brands we typically use. The thickness was great when we used them to wipe kid hands on the go but we didn’t care for them when changing poopy diapers. The thickness also didn’t allow these to pull through the wipes warmer that we use. Overall, recommended for wiping hands or urine-only diapers. Not recommended for use in wipes warmer or with poopy diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes. they are a little pricey but they are thick, smooth and moist. Great for those extra icky moments. Only issue I have with these are that at times the wipes have a weird smell can’t really explain but it’s just an odd odor
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Wipes On Market
customer_reviews.text: Just buy them. Excellent quality. Strong and durable. No Scent. Environmentally friendly. Soft on baby's sensitive bottom. Doesn't break out skin like other brands. Very thankful for these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Tried multiple brands & Honest was the winner
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Honest Wipes. They are larger than the average wipe and. I also feel like they are a little more wet which I like. I’ve tried at LEAST 4 other brands to find my favorite and Honest was the winner! I also like buying these in the bulk box delivered straight to my door!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Armer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby wipes we have used for our kid yet! They are a good strength. They don’t pull apart easily/break. These don’t break my kid out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: My niece has very sensitive skin and these are the only wipes that won't irritate her skin. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: David Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Baby Wipes - Where Have You Been?!?
customer_reviews.text: I just discovered the wonderful baby wipes and diapers that The Honest Company has to offer. I don’t know why I never tried these before and I’m on my FOURTH baby. I won’t go back to the other brands anymore. These wipes were more gentle on my baby and family’s skin. Other brands, even the sensitive kinds would burn the baby’s sensitive areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jfm

customer_reviews.title: Weird texture but do the job
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a person that can touch things like cotton balls - the texture freaks me out and... This particular texture of these wipes honestly give me chills even thinking about them... I have to use regular wipes and have my husband use these. So just forewarning if you’re sensitive like me. You might not like these
customer_reviews.author: Annlee

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger babies!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great! They are also very absorbent and catch even near blow outs fully!
customer_reviews.author: Mihaela I.

customer_reviews.title: Red rash immediately
customer_reviews.text: YIKES! My pictures should say it all! Took us over a week to get rid of the red rash from ONE use of these! The version of these wipes from Honest directly were great, but something about this batch does not settle well with my babe! RETURNED AND REFUNDED!
customer_reviews.author: Tarrin A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t knw if I’ll buy again
customer_reviews.text: One of my box’s was opened n I was missing one page .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst upgrade
customer_reviews.text: These were great until they changed the formula. Now they fall apart easy, smell gross, but my baby is covered in a rash when I use them. My hands also break out when I touch them. I do not recommend for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie V

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market
customer_reviews.text: We tried all wipes on the market. This one is the best. It's perfect moisture content and the pattern help a lot. My husband loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: These are fake.. made the child break out and have been buying from target for over a year. Compared side by side and visibly different
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling clean.
customer_reviews.text: I only use Honest wipes because it’s the wipe that feels like it doesn’t leave anything behind on the skin. I’m not fond of the wipes that leave the skin feeling like it has a slippery/slimy lotion on it.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: Won’t unfold properly.
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible wipes. They don’t unfold properly, and they stay clinging to the next wipe so you pull out a whole string of wipes. Because they don’t unfold easily, you have about 2/3 of a wipe to work with unless you have two hands free to finagle to wipe open. Not nearly as good as the cheap store brands.
customer_reviews.author: GreatNorthWoods

customer_reviews.title: Great to purchase on Sale
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale for a great price. I like the wipes but they are expensive unless you can find them on sale
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality is 10/10!!! Great quality wipes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I would ever find another company better than or even close to Huggies, but I’m wrong, I won’t say it’s better but it’s definitely up in its category. I love that I don’t have to double up, it wipes my baby bottom clean and it smells great. The quality is a 10/10!! Thank you The Honest Company!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mznewyork09

customer_reviews.title: Terrible wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I have several Honest products I love, but I couldn’t hate these wipes more. I’ve never cursed so much changing diapers! The texture of the wipe means when you pull one out, they stick to each other and you get a chain of 2, or 3, or 4, and they won’t.let.go.of.each.other so you have to shake and flap them around until they fly all over the room, all while trying to keep your baby from peeing or pooping on you. They aren’t wet enough, so they dry out super fast and I’ve thrown SO many away. SO disappointed and SO glad that my normal favorite brand is back in stock!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baas

customer_reviews.title: Best baby wipes!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes keep my baby from getting diaper rashes, ever since i tried Honest Company I have not gone back to any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nubia

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I have used these wipes for 3 years and always like them. They just changed their packaging and now when u pull out a wipe and u get 5 ... since u pull wipes when u are dealing with a mess it is typically 1 handed ... so there u are with a sting of expensive wipes a screaming kid and a mess u have to manage. I am very dissatisfied with this and will be switching brands. This box usually last me a month but the new packaging made it last 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Mox_Foulder

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use another wipe brand ever
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most amazing products I found in a long long time. I went to four different stores to try to find bulk so that I can purchase more since Amazon was all out. Amazing quality. Amazing softness and thickness absolutely love this brand and product. And they are ethically made and 99% water doesn't get better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Nature girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't change a thing!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they clean . . . . .my granddaughter's diaper change. Not irritating like some other wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good wipe!
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews and disagree with them. These wipes are strong and moist. The individual dispensers are the best I’ve ever seen. I bought these because I couldn’t find Huggies at the time. They are not as soft as the Huggies brand and are quite expensive, but are an excellent product, just the same.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE A.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I think I was sent old ones. I buy honest wipes all the time, this is the first time I bought them from amazon and they were very dry. Their wipes are usually very moist but being so dry they made my baby’s butt red and irritated.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not very soft. And it’s so hard to pull out each time, takes two hands to separate the pieces which is ridiculous, for this reason I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: mammoth bear

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wet wipes! They are nice and thick and they work perfect for my sons sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unscented gentle wipes
customer_reviews.text: Honest Co never fails us. An absolute favorite for us. Gentle on baby's face and booty. We still use these for toddler hands, too. Quality, great texture wipes for sensitive skin. Unscented, which is a plus for sensitive to smell noses! Bonus was that I found these for 30% off the day of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Unscented and no alcohol so it won’t sting. Also great for quick vom cleanups! I’ve tried other brands and feel the Honest brand wipes are easier to pull out of the package quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy mom!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby wipes of all time! Thick wipes and they don’t dry out easily (I’ve left the package open a couple times). Sure they’re a bit more expensive but they are much better quality and soft to the touch!
customer_reviews.author: Isbel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Caused a rash - returned
customer_reviews.text: We had been using WaterWipes for almost two years before I discovered a moldy batch, which gave me some pause in continuing to use it. We switched to Honest Wipes based on reviews on its purity and quality. Unfortunately, it was a bit rough for my toddler's bottom, and caused her to have a reaction. We switched back to WaterWipes, and her rash went away.
customer_reviews.author: Neelie

customer_reviews.title: We love Honest Company
customer_reviews.text: We love Honest Company for our child's sensitive skin! I like that they didn't add more waste by putting in an additional box!
customer_reviews.author: Speechasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pull apart
customer_reviews.text: These are THE WORST for convenience. As a parent, it is frustrating to pull out 3 wipes just because they are folded together in a way they don't separate when you pull one out. I was excited about this brand but ended up having such an annoying experience. If they changed how they held together inside of the packaging, I would like them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ward

customer_reviews.title: Only wipes I use
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes ever!! I don't understand the peolle that complain about it!! I'm a mom of four and I've only come to use Honest products with my last child and I will never buy any other brand for my little one! Way superior quality and no more red, irritated bums!
customer_reviews.author: Maila Serda

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality product
customer_reviews.text: It's great for sensitive skin. It's a premium quality cotton wipes. It's kind of pricey but it is the real deal. We will be using them for our son when he is born and ordering more for sure in the future. My woman skin is sensitive, allergic to many chemicals and she had no issues with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: E.Q.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: these are my favorite non reuseable wipes. work well. thick, soft, moist, don't cause any reaction. fragrance free. i do wish i could figure out how to get more wipes with less plastic containers, and i wish they were more biodegradable/compostable, but i guess at least theyre trying.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

product_meta.title: The Honest Company, Baby Wipes, Hypoallergenic Honest Wipes,576 Count
product_meta.description: Color:Classic| Size:576 CountHonest is taking care of business, cheek to cheek. Honest baby wipes provide the convenience of a disposable cloth baby wipe in a plant-based and hypoallergenic alternative. From wet bottoms and messy fingers to sticky counters and gunked-up toys, this wipe can do it all. They’re available in a variety of cute prints and convenient sizes to handle messes at home or on the go, perfect for your purse, diaper bag or anywhere you might need an emergency stash! These wipes are cute enough to be used as a design statement! Made without fragrances, alcohol, parabens, or quaternary ammonium compounds, our Pure and Gentle formula supports healthy skin. The hygiene-grade cloth, made from sustainably harvested plant-based materials, is ultra-thick, super-absorbent, and durable. Honest wipes are infused with a blend of pomegranate, chamomile, cucumber, and masterwork leaf for a natural experience. We love our babies. We love your babies. That’s why we err on the side of caution when it comes to ingredient selection, doing our best to avoid chemicals of concern. We use smart ingredients to create trusted products that work because we believe that you shouldn’t have to choose between what works and what’s good for you. We’re always exploring and evolving to maximize our use of renewable resources, from the plant-derived ingredients in our baby products to the amount of recycled material in our packaging. At Honest, giving back drives who we are and what we do. It is in our brand’s DNA and informs every aspect of our business and operations, and we believe that it is our responsibility to help create a healthy and sustainable future for all. This deep sense of purpose is passionately demonstrated in our actions and service to our families, our planet, and our communities as we strive to create long-term value and positive social impact. Note: Packaging may vary.
feature_bullets: Honestly clean: Honest wipes provide the convenience of a disposable cloth baby wipe in a hypoallergenic and plant-based alternative: the wipe that can do it all, from wet bottoms and messy fingers, to sticky counters.
Pure & gentle: These hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested wipes contain more than 99% water, making them gentle enough for sensitive skin.
Made without: Alcohol, parabens, chlorine processing or fragrances.

Plant-based: Honest wipes are thoughtfully designed and contain everything you need and nothing you don’t. Our wipes are made from sustainably harvested plant-based material and are ultra-thick and durable. They’re embossed and interlocked for extra loft and softness and for easy pop-up dispensing.
Our honest purpose: The Honest Company was born of a simple purpose: To create safe, effective products for our families and yours. Phthalate free
